name: Sold hold for Jon Anne
description: 24" x 36" x 1" pre- stretched, ready to hang canvas

name: Sold Hold for Maggie
description:
Birds on Wires No. 535

This is an original mixed media painting on canvas.

CANVAS/SUPPORT : This painting will be shipped rolled and unstretched. You can hang it unstretched, tapestry style or have it stretched traditionally, onto a frame at a frame shop in your area.

All paintings are securely boxed/tubed and shipped via UPS Ground (Contiguous US 48) or USPS Priority Mail AK/HI/International.

A tracking number will be emailed to you when the painting has been shipped

CUSTOMS/DUTY : We ship worldwide. International customers please be aware that you are responsible for all customs fees, duty and taxes

GUARANTEE : We offer a 100% money back guarantee if for any reason you are unsatisfied with the painting when you receive it. Please note that you will be responsible for return shipping charges though.

name: "Dancer" 10X8 Charcoal ON PANEL
description:
This is an original carbon and conté sketch over mixed media collage on (.25 in) thin wood panel.

This drawing comes framed in a 1.75 in. wide, solid wood (poplar) frame. I will choose the frame color either black or white depending on the piece, just email me if you have a preference. There is no discount in price if you don't want the frame.

Final outer dimensions of the piece with the frame is 11.5 x 14.5 in (29.25 x 36.75 cm)

SHIPPING : All paintings are securely packed in boxes and shipped via USPS Priority Mail or USPS Global Priority Mail.

A tracking number will be emailed to you when the painting has been shipped

CUSTOMS/DUTY : We ship worldwide. International customers please be aware that you are responsible for all customs fees, duty and taxes

COMBINED PURCHASES : We can combine up to 3 like sized paintings in one box for the same shipping price

GUARANTEE : We offer a 100% money back guarantee (minus shipping) if for any reason you are unsatisfied with the painting when you receive it.

name: Outlaw (Painted metal sculpture)
description:
SIZE : 27" x 20" x 7" 9 (deep)

TITLE : Outlaw [mixed media on recycled metal cow skull]

LOCATION: AM Galleries 115 Ludington Ave. Ludington, MI

MEDIUM : This is an original mixed media painting using any / all of the following materials: Acrylic, oil and enamel paints, oil stick, graphite, ink pen, paint pen, transfer image, collage, graphite, conte, charcoal 

I have finished this piece with 2 coats of UVLS glaze, then 2 coats of UV varnish to seal and protect it

SUPPORT : This painting has been painted on a rough welded, recycled metal... um... cow skull. 

Hanging bracket has been attached to the back

SHIPPING : All paintings are securely packed in boxes and shipped via UPS Ground or USPS Global Priority Mail. 

A tracking number will be emailed to you when the painting has been shipped

CUSTOMS/DUTY : We ship worldwide. International customers please be aware that you are responsible for all customs fees, duty and taxes

Combined Purchases: We can combine up to 3 like sized paintings in one box for the same shipping price

GUARANTEE : We offer a 100% money back guarantee (minus shipping) if for any reason you are unsatisfied with the painting when you receive it
